Hero.description: I'm a passionate developer, working on building innovative solutions with modern technologies.

About.resume: I'm a passionate and dedicated **software developer**, constantly seeking to enhance my skills and tackle new technological challenges. Started my career as a **Mobile Developer** focused in _Android_, worked as a **Fullstack Developer** and now I'm a **Software Developer / AI ML Jr**, working with web development and Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning projects.

experiences.title: Software Developer / AI ML Jr
experiences.description: Promoted to Junior Developer, expanding my scope from web development to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning projects. Participated in the design and development of fullstack applications integrated with AI resources. Worked with Python, LangChain and Machine Learning models, creating prototypes and pipelines for AI-based solutions.

experiences.title: Software Development Scholar
experiences.description: Worked on frontend software development, creating responsive and intuitive interfaces with React, Tanstack Router and TypeScript. Created low and medium fidelity wireframe prototypes in Figma to validate user flows and interface design. Participated in project requirements gathering and documentation, contributing to the definition of functionalities and application scope.

experiences.title: Software Development Intern
experiences.description: Worked as Fullstack Developer with React and Nest.js, contributing to the development of modern and scalable web applications. Worked in Dockerized environment, implementing good practices for versioning and code organization. Collaborated in multidisciplinary teams applying agile methodologies (Scrum).

experiences.title: Mobile Development Intern
experiences.description: Worked as Android Developer, developing and maintaining mobile applications with Java and Kotlin. Designed and implemented interface components focusing on usability and responsiveness. Used version control with Git/GitHub/GitLab for collaborative development.

records.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Systems Analysis and Development

Skills.description: Skills and technologies I have worked with.

Project.description: Here are a few of my favorite projects that I have worked on.

projects.title: Renatodev.com
projects.description: My personal website, where I share my knowledge and experiences.

projects.title: Dev-Connect
projects.description: Connect with developers from around the world and share your ideas and projects on a dynamic and interactive platform.

projects.title: ShowScout
projects.description: ShowScout is a web application that allows users to log in with their Spotify account and view upcoming shows of their favorite artists. The application leverages the Spotify API to fetch the list of artists the user follows and displays their upcoming concerts using the TicketMaster API.

projects.title: Dg Rei da Palha
projects.description: A comprehensive website for a local confectionery company, featuring an engaging landing page for product showcase and a robust admin panel for efficient management of products and transactions.
